1. UI Kit
  2. Buttons
Colors

Standard button colors can be created with btn-* classes.

Sizes

Sizes can be useful for different resolution and you can add them with just btn-xs, btn-sm or btn-lg classes.

Icons

Create circle btns with btn-icon-circle class and flat btns with default class.

Button Groups

Default Group

Multiple buttons wrapped inside btn-group class.


Button Toolbar

Use btn-toolbar wrapped around multiple btn-group classes.

Vertical Group

Use btn-group-vertical to arrange buttons vertically.

  • Action
  • Another action
  • Something else here
  • Separated link
Variations
Block Buttons

Full size buttons created with btn-block class.

Button Tags
CSS3 JavaScript PHP Wordpress Photoshop Illustrator Animation Books
Toggles

Use btn-checkbox or btn-radio directive to create checkboxes and toggles.
